problem_text_cn: 如图是拦水坝的横断面,斜坡AB的水平宽度为12米,斜面坡度为1:2,则斜坡AB的长为()米．
problem_text_en: The picture shows the cross section of the dam. The horizontal width of slope AB is N_0, and the slope of the slope is N_1:N_2, so the length of slope AB is ().
raw_answer: 解:在Rt△ABE中,∵i$=\frac{BE}{AE}=\frac{1}{2}$,AE=12米,∴BC=6米,根据勾股定理得:AB$=√{AE^{2}+BE^{2}}=$6$√{5}$米,故选:B．
